titleStmt.title: The second day of the First vveeke of the most excellent, learned, and diuine poet, VVilliam, Lord Bartas. Done out of French into English heroicall verse by Thomas VVinter, Maister of Artes
Sepmaine. Day 2. English
titleStmt.author: Du Bartas, Guillaume de Salluste, seigneur, 1544-1590.
Winter, Thomas, Master of Arts.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by R. Field] for Iames Shaw,

notesStmt.note: A translation of the second day of: La sepmaine.
Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
